overview.tax_residency_rules: No personal income tax or corporate income tax.

personal_income_tax.exemptions: All income is exempt from personal income tax.

corporate_tax.deductions: Deductions are not applicable as there is no corporate income tax.

capital_gains_tax.exemptions: All capital gains are exempt from tax.

property_tax.rate: Landowners pay an annual land rental tax.

inheritance_tax.exemptions: All inherited assets are exempt from tax.

wealth_tax.exemptions: All net wealth is exempt from tax.

digital_nomad_visa.requirements: Valid passport, proof of income, health insurance.
digital_nomad_visa.tax_benefits: Exempt from personal income tax and corporate income tax on Vanuatu-sourced income.

additional_notes.economic_stability: Vanuatu has a stable economy with low inflation.
additional_notes.legal_system: Vanuatu has a stable legal system based on English common law.
additional_notes.ease_of_doing_business: Ranked 86th in the World Bank's Ease of Doing Business Index.
